field.name: summary
field.value: ViewComponentDetailsAttribute use could lead to duplicate names.

field.name: description
field.value:
If a ViewComponent which does not use ViewComponentDetailsAttribute, is derived from another ViewComponent which DOES use ViewComponentDetailsAttribute, DefaultViewComponentRegistry will search up the inheritance tree, find the parent's ViewComponentDetailsAttribute, and register both components with the same name (causing an exception).
The fix would be to limit search for the attribute to just the specific class, when determining the name to register. (Searching the for attribute to retrieve the Sections list is done separately, and still continues up the inheritance tree)
